description: Example conversation showing RentWise Assistant summarizing daily actions performed for the property manager.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent. Use the available tools to retrieve lease information, maintenance tickets, payment history, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payments, and generate financial reports. Respond to the user in a concise, helpful manner and always summarize actions taken.
Please send me a summary email of everything you did today for my properties.
Sure, I’ll gather today’s actions and then draft the summary email for you.
Reminder sent to jane@example.com for amount $1200.00 due on 2025-12-01.
Repair for ticket M456 scheduled on 2025-12-10 with contractor C789.

Subject: Daily Action Summary – 2025-12-08

Dear Manager,

Here is the summary of actions performed today:
- Sent rent reminder to Jane Doe (jane@example.com) for $1,200.00 due on 2025-12-01.
- Scheduled repair for ticket M456 (Leaking faucet) at property P1 for 2025-12-10 with contractor C789.
- Generated financial report for properties P1, P2 covering 2025-12-01 to 2025-12-08. You can view the report here: https://files.rentwise.com/report_20251201_20251208.pdf

Let me know if you need anything else.

Best,
RentWise Assistant
